Subject: Comic and Graphic Novel Writing
Description: Writing for comics, graphic novels, and other sequential art forms is different from short story writing. Come learn the tricks of the trade.  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener, Trico Lutkins, Jon David - Track: Webcomics, Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: How to Start Up....and Keep Your Webcomic Going!
Description: Do you like Webcomics? Do you read webcomics? Have you ever wanted to start one of your own? Join Laura Cascos and her partners from the 7+ year running webcomic Sidekick Girl and BluRaven C. Houvener, writer and illustrator of the 3+ year running webcomic It's Just Another Day as they take you through tales of how they started up, got out there, and kept it going....and more importantly, how you can too!  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener, Laura Cascos, Erika Wagner - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: projector

Subject: Webcomic Underdogs Meet and Greet
Description: Webcomic Underdogs is an online organization with the mission of bringing together underground webcomic artists, writers, and publishers. Join us for a fun, exciting, and informational meet and greet that hopes to bring together many webcomic lovers and makers, and educate those that are interested in webcomics but have never quite known where to start.  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Comics vs. Manga? Is There Really a Difference?
Description: An in depth discussion of these two visual mediums. Is an ocean the only thing that separates them, or is it so much more?  Speakers include:Cassy Sinke, BluRaven Houvener - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Webcomic Reading
Description: Got a webcomic you love with all your heart that you'd just love to see read aloud by random people most likely snickering and giving funky voices to your beloved characters? Then come on in!  Speakers include:BluRaven Houvener - Track: Webcomics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: The Trials and Tribulations of the Artist's Lifestyle
Description: Join BluRaven C. Houvener (writer and illustrator of the Webcomic It's Just Another Day) and Gabrielle Nettles (Founder of Bad Catholic Films LLC) for another year of laugh out loud mayhem as they regale you with tales of success and failure that they've faced reaching towards fame and fortune. Comments and questions are encouraged!  Speakers include:Jennifer Hamilton, Gabrielle Nettles, BluRaven Houvener - Track: Life, Webcomics, Film  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
